source.name: LEA Universe
source.description: The purpose of the CCD nonfiscal surveys is to provide a listing of all schools and agencies providing free public elementary and secondary education, along with basic descriptive statistical information on each school and agency listed. Penalties apply for misuse, see http://nces.ed.gov/ncesglobal/data_usage_agreement.asp for more details.
